item.title: By: Judith & Matt
item.dc:creator: Judith & Matt
item.description: <p>Hi Matt this is your wake up call! we just had a really nice sunday roast ha-ha!! but you did miss out on all that washing up! Sounds like your having a good time and starting to relax. You must be in heaven with all those G &G's ( Gadgets & Geeks) sorry people but it's true. By the way Ipswich lost to 2-0 to Bradford & Herman got sent off for elbowing someone in the face. Keep in touch looking forward to our postcard hint hint!! take care J & M</p>
item.content:encoded: Hi Matt this is your wake up call! we just had a really nice sunday roast ha-ha!! but you did miss out on all that washing up! Sounds like your having a good time and starting to relax. You must be in heaven with all those G &G’s ( Gadgets & Geeks) sorry people but it’s true. By the way Ipswich lost to 2-0 to Bradford & Herman got sent off for elbowing someone in the face. Keep in touch looking forward to our postcard hint hint!! take care J & M
